text: Tungjoy is a village in Senapati district, Manipur, India. It is one of the largest villages of the Poumai Naga tribe. ==Economy== Paddy rice, cabbages, potatoes, maize, and cereals are some of the economic crops of the village. Cabbage farming is the main source of income. Rice is the staple food. Cattle, buffalo, and pigs are the main animals reared in the village. Poultry and fish are common as well. Category:Villages in Senapati district
title: Tungjoy
